alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 2:55PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Marion County through 330 PM EDT... At 254 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms near Ocala Airport, or 8 miles southwest of Ocala, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Sparr, Santos, Anthony, Ocala Airport, Reddick, Lowell and Romeo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Marion; Western Marion
